description: ICESa (Ice, Cloud, and Land Elevation Satellite 2) is a NASA/GSFC mission within the ESE (Earth Science Enterprise) program. 3-year nominal mission life, 5-year goal. Continue the assessment of polar ice changes and measure vegetation canopy heights, allowing estimates of biomass and carbon in aboveground vegetation in conjunction with related missions, and allow measurements of solid earth properties.
title: ICESat-2
